wikipedia_page.main: David Hathaway is an English evangelist and founder and president of Eurovision Mission to Europe, as well as editorial director of Prophetic Vision magazine.

response: Also in 1974, Carr involved himself in successful negotiations to release the Pentecostal minister David Hathaway from prison in Czechoslovakia, where he had been charged with distributing religious literature.  In 1975, he proposed the addition of "Social Democrat" to the Liberal Party's name, as he believed that this would appeal to both Labour Party and some Conservative Party voters.  This suggestion was not taken up until the 1988, when the Liberals merged with the Social Democratic Party.
Individual Bible smugglers include Andrew van der Bijl, David Hathaway, and John White.
